6 from niryo_robot_utils import sentry_init

8 from std_msgs.msg import Int32, Bool
9 from niryo_robot_rpi.common.abstract_shutdown_manager import AbstractShutdownManager
10 
11 
12 class FakeNiryoButton:
13 
14  def __init__(self):
15  rospy.logdebug("FakeNiryoButton - Entering in Init")
16 
17  # Publisher used to send info to Niryo Studio, so the user can add a move block
18  # by pressing the button
19  self.save_point_publisher = rospy.Publisher("/niryo_robot/blockly/save_current_point", Int32, queue_size=10)
20 
21  self.__button_state_publisher = rospy.Publisher("/niryo_robot/rpi/is_button_pressed",
22  Bool,
23  latch=True,
24  queue_size=1)
25 
26  self.__button_state_publisher.publish(False)
27  rospy.set_param('~initialized', True)
28 
29 
30 class NiryoFakeRpi(object):
31 
32  def __init__(self):
33  self.niryo_robot_fake_button = FakeNiryoButton()
34 
35  hardware_version = rospy.get_param('~hardware_version')
36 
37  if hardware_version in ["ned2", "ned3pro"]:
38  from niryo_robot_rpi.panel_v2.fake_panel import FakeIOPanel
39  else:
40  from niryo_robot_rpi.panel_v1.fake_panel import FakeIOPanel
41 
42  self.digital_io_panel = FakeIOPanel()
43 
44  self.shutdown_manager = AbstractShutdownManager(fake=True)
45 
46 
47 if __name__ == '__main__':
48  sentry_init()
49 
50  rospy.init_node('niryo_robot_rpi', anonymous=False, log_level=rospy.INFO)
51 
52  # change logger level according to node parameter
53  log_level = rospy.get_param("~log_level")
54  logger = logging.getLogger("rosout")
55  logger.setLevel(log_level)
56 
57  NiryoFakeRpi()
58  rospy.spin()
